item.title: Use Github actions to create Shopware 6 Plugin zips
item.description: Shopware offers the possibility to upload .zip files in the backend to install plugins. As an open source developer, the main way to distribute my plugins was to offer a composer command. However, not all Shopware installations (or webmaster) have the possibility to easily add extra dependencies through composer. To not have the hassle of creating the zip files manually, it’s possible to use Github Actions to automatically create it whenever you tag a new version.
